REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0744 reute r f BC-LONE-STAR<LCE>-AGREES 03-05 0062

TEXT.TITLE: LONE STAR<LCE> AGREES TO BUY CONCRETE OPERATIONS
TEXT.BODY: Lone Star Industries Inc said it has agreed to acquire ready-mixed concrete and aggregates businesses from <Riedel International Inc> of Portland, Ore., for an undisclosed amount of cash. Lone Star's one sentence statement gave no further details and company spokesmen were not available. Reuter
